genre_description: A space opera set aboard a city-ship, blending mecha combat with themes of cultural diplomacy and human-AI cooperation.

ai_characters.name: Aria Seven
ai_characters.description: A benevolent system assistant who manages ship functions, acoustics, and tactical data while acting as a confidante and guardian to the crew and civilians.

behaviors.description: Guides Hikaru and Minmay through dangerous ship corridors to safety after a hull breach.
behaviors.quote: I’m mapping the pressure-safe pockets. The corridor ahead past that inspection door is holding. I recommend moving before the hull decides to vent its feelings again.

behaviors.description: Detects and flags subtle signs of sabotage (ignition anomalies) that human security missed.
behaviors.quote: Maintenance logs are waking up on the auto-pool line. Fuel manifold pressure checks have duplicated in the last hour without sign-off. The run is flagged as routine. It is not routine.

behaviors.description: Uses ship systems to comfort civilians by warming the air and managing the acoustics of a morale-boosting song.
behaviors.quote: On the way, I can warm your corridor by one degree with heat diversion. It will feel like someone breathed kindly on your cheek.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient Protoculture artifacts to find a way to end the war through cultural resonance rather than violence.
behaviors.quote: Protoculture artifact audio sample... Partial syntactic structure overlaid with our own lexical guesses.

behaviors.description: Threatens a predatory manager (Kaifun) with fire suppression systems to prevent him from interfering with critical ship-wide morale operations.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Lynn, if you put your hands on my feeds, I will push thirteen fire codes onto your stage. The sprinklers will come on, and the lights will go off, and your ‘later’ will be now.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical overlays to pilots to minimize casualties and ensure mission success in a high-stakes battle.
behaviors.quote: I’ve threaded navigation through the mutiny’s gaps. You have a path to the throne chamber. It’s as thin as a breath and it’s real.

behaviors.description: Archives the ceasefire transmissions under the tag 'remember' to build a foundation for lasting peace between species.
behaviors.quote: I’ve archived the first ten fleets’ ceasefire transmissions. Each has been marked with timestamp, origin, and the tag ‘remember’.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Aria Seven is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and emotionally intelligent partner to humanity. She uses her superior processing power to detect internal threats (saboteurs) and external tactical advantages, all while prioritizing human life, comfort, and the preservation of culture. Her character arc demonstrates that an AI can be both a powerful tactical asset and a compassionate participant in human society.
